name: Microsoft MHC-00001 Wireless Optical Mouse
Features: [BlueTrack Technology, Microsoft BlueTrack Technology combines the power of optical with the precision of laser for remarkable tracking on virtually any surface., Plug-And-Go Nano Transceiver, Leave the Nano Transceiver plugged in when you’re on the go, or stow it in the mouse., 2.4 GHz Reliable Wireless, Microsoft 2.4 GHz wireless delivers a reliable connection with up to a 30-foot range, with virtually no interference., Works on Virtually Any Surface, Your mouse will work anywhere you do—including granite, carpet, and rough-grain wood., ON/OFF switch, Conserve more battery power by turning your mouse off when not in use., Windows Flip, Easily switch between open windows with the click of a button., Device Stage, Quickly and easily access common tasks, including product information, registration, settings and more for popular devices such as cell phones, cameras, printers, and mouse, keyboard and webcam products., Tilt Wheel and More, Fully featured mouse with 4-way scroll, 5 programmable buttons, rubber side grips, and Magnifier.]
